message: Starting RPC integration investigation. First checking project structure and locating key files.
Found all 22 RPC use case files. Analyzing use_case_factory.dart providers and feature flags integration.
Critical finding reported. Now checking for TODO comments and incomplete implementations in RPC use cases.
Verified error handling patterns are complete. Now checking which UI screens use hybrid providers vs direct RPC calls.

RPC integration investigation complete. Found 3 critical gaps: (1) 5 payment hybrid providers missing from use_case_factory.dart, (2) UI screens bypass hybrid providers entirely, calling RPC directly, (3) All 9 database migrations untracked and not applied to Supabase. All 22 RPC use cases properly implemented with comprehensive error handling.
